trans-unit.source: How to Deliver Streaming Content from Media Services
trans-unit.target: How to Deliver Streaming Content from Media Services

trans-unit.source: Learn how to create a locator that is used to build a streaming URL. The code uses REST API.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to create a locator that is used to build a streaming URL. The code uses REST API.

trans-unit.source: You can stream an adaptive bitrate MP4 set by creating an OnDemand streaming locator and building a streaming URL.
trans-unit.target: You can stream an adaptive bitrate MP4 set by creating an OnDemand streaming locator and building a streaming URL.

trans-unit.source: The <linkText>encoding an asset</linkText><title></title> topic shows how to encode into an adaptive bitrate MP4 set.
trans-unit.target: The <linkText>encoding an asset</linkText><title></title> topic shows how to encode into an adaptive bitrate MP4 set.

trans-unit.source: If your content is encrypted, configure asset delivery policy (as described in <linkText>this</linkText><title></title> topic) before creating a locator.
trans-unit.target: If your content is encrypted, configure asset delivery policy (as described in <linkText>this</linkText><title></title> topic) before creating a locator.

trans-unit.source: You can also use an OnDemand streaming locator to build URLs that point to MP4 files that can be progressively downloaded.
trans-unit.target: You can also use an OnDemand streaming locator to build URLs that point to MP4 files that can be progressively downloaded.

trans-unit.source: This topic shows how to create an OnDemand streaming locator in order to publish your asset and build a Smooth, MPEG DASH, and HLS streaming URLs.
trans-unit.target: This topic shows how to create an OnDemand streaming locator in order to publish your asset and build a Smooth, MPEG DASH, and HLS streaming URLs.

trans-unit.source: It also shows hot to build progressive download URLs.
trans-unit.target: It also shows hot to build progressive download URLs.

trans-unit.source: The <linkText>following</linkText><title></title> section shows the enum types whose values are used in the REST calls.
trans-unit.target: The <linkText>following</linkText><title></title> section shows the enum types whose values are used in the REST calls.

trans-unit.source: To create the OnDemand streaming locator and get URLs you need to do the following:
trans-unit.target: To create the OnDemand streaming locator and get URLs you need to do the following:

trans-unit.source: If the content is encrypted, define an access policy.
trans-unit.target: If the content is encrypted, define an access policy.

trans-unit.source: Create an OnDemand streaming locator.
trans-unit.target: Create an OnDemand streaming locator.

trans-unit.source: If you plan to stream, get the streaming manifest file (.ism) in the asset.
trans-unit.target: If you plan to stream, get the streaming manifest file (.ism) in the asset.

trans-unit.source: If you plan to progressively download, get the names of MP4 files in the asset.
trans-unit.target: If you plan to progressively download, get the names of MP4 files in the asset.

trans-unit.source: Build URLs to the manifest file or MP4 files.
trans-unit.target: Build URLs to the manifest file or MP4 files.

trans-unit.source: Request:
trans-unit.target: Request:

trans-unit.source: Response:
trans-unit.target: Response:

trans-unit.source: Create the locator for the specified asset and asset policy.
trans-unit.target: Create the locator for the specified asset and asset policy.

trans-unit.target: Request:

trans-unit.source: Response:
trans-unit.target: Response:

trans-unit.source: Use the Path value returned after the creation of the locator to build the Smooth, HLS, and MPEG DASH URLs.
trans-unit.target: Use the Path value returned after the creation of the locator to build the Smooth, HLS, and MPEG DASH URLs.

trans-unit.source: Smooth Streaming: Path + manifest file name + "/manifest"
trans-unit.target: Smooth Streaming: Path + manifest file name + "/manifest"

trans-unit.source: example:
trans-unit.target: example:

trans-unit.source: HLS: Path + manifest file name + "/manifest(format=m3u8-aapl)"
trans-unit.target: HLS: Path + manifest file name + "/manifest(format=m3u8-aapl)"

trans-unit.target: example:

trans-unit.source: DASH: Path + manifest file name + "/manifest(format=mpd-time-csf)"
trans-unit.target: DASH: Path + manifest file name + "/manifest(format=mpd-time-csf)"

trans-unit.target: example:

trans-unit.source: Use the Path value returned after the creation of the locator to build the progressive download URL.
trans-unit.target: Use the Path value returned after the creation of the locator to build the progressive download URL.

trans-unit.source: URL: Path + asset file mp4 name
trans-unit.target: URL: Path + asset file mp4 name
